question: Which best explains why the total mass of the product(s) would be less than the total weight of the reactant(s) after a chemical reaction?
candidate_answers: (A) A physical change occurred. (B) Atoms involved in the reaction lost mass. (C) Precipitates were created in the new solution. (D) Gases were released to the atmosphere.
answer: Gases were released to the atmosphere.
label: D
